item.description: On Aug 11th, Putnam has a concert in Rotary Park, beginning around 6 pm, with fire on the water. People could convene at my house before hand for indoor or outdoor games snacking, and then car pool to Putnam for the Little Big Band, Swing music...  This is a mulit-group event so there will be others coming from other groups as well.  Fun!

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Rain or shine! Games then River Fire in Putnam-Little Big Band
